hero.headline: Artificial Wisdom at the Edge
hero.tagline: Thoughtful AI. Human-centered. Your data remains with you.
hero.subheadline: We craft privacy-first applications and tools that run locally and feel alive — intelligent technology that empowers reflection, creativity, and connection.

about.title: A Studio for Quiet, Powerful AI Technology
about.content: At Gigabyte Alchemy, we use cutting-edge AI to build human-first tools and experiences. Our focus is edge-native, privacy-respecting, and emotionally intelligent design.
about.detail: From journaling apps to community tools, everything we make shares one core principle: technology should serve, not detract.
about.closing: We work at the intersection of cutting-edge engineering and thoughtful design — blending technical excellence with human-first design.

philosophy.title: Artificial Wisdom, Not Just Intelligence
philosophy.intro: We believe in a new category of technology — one that combines performance with presence.
philosophy.definition: Artificial Wisdom means building tools that:
principles: Run locally, respecting both your privacy and your pace
philosophy.closing: We are not trying to build AGI. We build AWE — Artificial Wisdom at the Edge. Thoughtful, grounded technology that creates space to be you.

footer.newsletter: Join our mailing list to find out more.
